00021         : QPixmap()

00029     Image::Image(const QString& filePath)
00030         : QPixmap(filePath)
00031     {
00032         m_filePath = filePath;

00051     Image::Image(const Image& img)
00052         : QPixmap(img)
00053     {
00054         m_data = img.data();
00055         m_shortName = img.shortName();
00056         m_filePath = img.filePath();
00057         m_width = img.imgWidth();
00058         m_height = img.imgHeight();
00059         m_isLoaded = false;
00060         setObjectName("Image");
00061     }

00063     Image::Image(Image* img)
00064     {
00065         m_shortName = img->shortName();
00066         m_filePath = img->filePath();
00067         m_width = img->imgWidth();
00068         m_height = img->imgHeight();
00069         m_isLoaded = false;
00070         setObjectName("Image");

00141     QString Image::baseName() const
00142     {
00143         return QDir::fromNativeSeparators(m_filePath).section("/", 0, -2);
00144     }

00146     QString Image::fileName(QString filePath)
00147     {

00149     }

00151     void Image::computeNewFileName(QString extension)
00152     {
00153         m_shortName = m_shortName.section('.', 0, -2)+"."+extension;
00154         m_filePath = baseName()+"/"+m_shortName;
00155     }
